title: Learn more: Curse of the Drowned Event

replies.body: i got the ward, crafted it, in loot but it doesnt show where i can pick my wards :(
Can We get a Vlad emote pls... Vamporo, although my personal favourite emote... just doesn't quite cut the... mustar... ketchup?
Can we please get a picture of the Pirate Poro summoner icon? I need to know if it's worth spending 350RP on.
So when will Pyke be in the shop? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Tomorrow. That's when the event starts and it mentions the release of Pyke as being part of the event.
